channel.title: Charlie Sheen
channel.description: Can someone tell me what started all this "Charlie Sheen - Winning" crap?

item.title: Charlie Sheen
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

I am not sure if he ever got his job back yet. But, I hear that Lorre is currently trying to discuss the possibility with NBC.

I would imagine he will get his job back as there was a contract involved and I heard a lawsuit was possible. Not sure of the progress of that though.

Read full topic

Yea, but then he was like “I wanna be paid for the rest of the season”, so then they brought him back on.

item.title: Charlie Sheen
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

He requires too much attention. After being fired by Chuck Lorrie from Two and a Half Men he started ranting on radio stations, followed by television interviews. In an attempt to get his job back he promised to go clean (but I guess he still needs to prove he can stay clean). Abuse of drugs has made him delusional into thinking he is godly, claiming he has Adonis and tiger blood. The popularity he gained over this went to his head, making him believe he was winning. He is still quite entertaining to watch, but if you watch some of his later shows/rants he is now just an embarrassment.

Read full topic

item.title: Charlie Sheen
item.dc:creator: @Ajdakiwii Ajdakiwii
item.description:
@Ajdakiwii wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:11, topic:392335”]If Charlie Sheen was a cleaner he’d be Charlie Clean
If Charlie Sheen was an organ he’d be Charlie Spleen
If Charlie Sheen was a robot he’d be Charlie Masheen
If Charlie Sheen was a chemical he’d be Charlie Benzene
If Charlie Sheen was a colour he’d be Charlie Green
If Charlie Sheen was a ninja, he’d be Charlie Unseen
If Charlie Sheen was a fan of good music he’d be Charlie Queen
If Charlie Sheen was pretty current he’d be Charlie Mainstream
If Charlie Sheen was an injection he’d be Charlie Vaccine
If Charlie Sheen was a holiday he’d be Charlie Halloween
If Charlie Sheen was a chef he’d be Charlie Cuisine[/quote]

If Charlie Sheen was a winner he’d be Charlie Sheen

Read full topic
